name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: [SOUND] This lecture is about

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: the feedback in the vector space model.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _In this lecture
column6: we continue talking about the feedback and text retrieval. _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Particularly we're going to talk about feedback in the vector space model.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: As we have discussed before in the case of feedback the task of

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: a text retrieval system is relearned from examples to improve retrieval accuracy.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _We will have positive examples

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: those are the documents that are assumed that will be random or

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: judged with being random and all the documents that are viewed by users.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _We also have negative examples
column6: those are documents known to be non-relevant. _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: They can also be the documents that are escaped by users.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: The general method in the vector space model for

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: feedback is to modify our query vector.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Now we want to place the query vector in a better position to make that accurate

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: and what does that mean exactly?

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Well
column6: if you think about the query vector that would mean you would have to do _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: something to vector elements.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And in general that would mean we might add new terms.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: We might adjust weights of old terms or assign weights to new terms.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And as a result in general the query will have more terms so

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: we often call this query expansion.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: The most effective method in the vector space model of feedback is called Rocchio

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: feedback which was actually proposed several decades ago.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _So
column6: the idea is quite simple we illustrate this idea by using a two-dimensional _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: display of all the documents in the collection and also the query vector.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _So
column6: now we can see the query vector is here in _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: the center and these are all of the documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So when we use a query vector and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: use a similarity function to find the most similar documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: We are basically drawing a circle here and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: then these documents would be basically the top-ranked documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _And this process of relevant documents

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _And these are random documents for example that's relevant

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And then these minuses are negative documents like this.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So our goal here is trying

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: to move this query vector to some position to improve the retrieval accuracy.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: By looking at this diagram what do you think where

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: should we move the query vector so that we can improve the retrieval accuracy.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Intuitively
column6: where do you want to move the query back to? _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: If you want to think more you can pause the video.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Now if you think about

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: this picture you can realize that in order to work well in this case

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: you want the query vector to be as close to the positive vectors as possible.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _That means
column6: ideally you want to place the query vector somewhere here or _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: we want to move the query vector closer to this point.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Now
column6: so what exactly at this point? _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Well
column6: if you want these relevant documents to be ranked on the top _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _you want this to be in the center of all of these relevant documents

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Because then if you draw a circle around this one

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: you get all these relevant documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So that means we can move the query back toward the centroid of

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: all the relevant document vectors.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _And this is basically the idea of Rocchio

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: of course you then can see that the centroid of negative documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And one move away from the negative documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Now geometrically we're talking about a moving vector

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: closer to some other vector and away from other vectors.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Algebraically it just means we have this formula.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Here you can see this is original query vector and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: this average basically is the centroid vector of relevant documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: When we take the average over these vectors

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: then we're computing the centroid of these vectors.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And similarly this is the average in that non-relevant document of vectors so

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _it's essentially of now random

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _And we have these three parameters here

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: They're controlling the amount of movement.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: When we add these two vectors together we're moving the query at the closer

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _to the centroid

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: When we subtracted this part we kind of move the query vector away from that

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: centroid so this is the main idea of Rocchio Feedback.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And after we have done this we will get a new query vector

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: which can use it to store documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: This new New query vector will then

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: reflect the move of this Original query vector toward

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: this Relevant centroid vector and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _away from the Non-relevant centroid vector

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _So let's take a look at example

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _This is the example that we have seen earlier only that I in the

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: of the actual documents I only showed the vector representation of these documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: We have five documents here and we have

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _true red in the documents here

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: They are displayed in red and these are the term vectors.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Now
column6: I just assumed an idea of weights

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: a lot of times we have zero weights of course.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _These are negative documents

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Now in this Rocchio method we first compute the centroid of

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: each category and so let's see.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Look at the centroid of the positive document but

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: we simply just so it's very easy to see.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: We just add this with this one the corresponding element and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: that's down here and take the average.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And then we're going to add the corresponding elements and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _then just take the average

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So we do this for all these.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _In the end
column6: what we have is this one. _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _This is the average vector of these two so it's a centroid of these two

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Let's also look at the centroid of the nested documents.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: This is basically the same we're going to take the average of three elements.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And these are the corresponding elements in these three vectors and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: so on and so forth.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _So in the end

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Now
column6: in the Rocchio feedback method we're going to combine all _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _these with original query vector

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So now let's see how we combine them together.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Well

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So we have a parameter outlier controlling the original query term weight that's 1.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And now I've beta to control the inference of the positive

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _centroid Vector weight that's 1.5 that comes from here

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So this goes here and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: we also have this negative wait here.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Conduit by a gamma here and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: this weight has come from of course the nective centroid here.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And we do exactly the same for other terms each is for one term.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: And this is our new vector.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _And we're going to use this new query vector
column6: this one to run the documents. _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _You can imagine what would happen

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Because of the movement that this one or

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: the match of these red documents much better.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Because we move this vector closer to them and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _it's going to penalize these black documents

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So this is precisely what we want from feedback.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Now of course
column6: if we apply this method in practice we will see one potential problem _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: and that is the original query has only four times that are not zero.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _But after we do queries

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: imagine you can imagine we'll have many terms that would have a number of weights.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So the calculation would have to involve more terms.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _In practice
column6: we often truncate this vector and _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: only retain the terms which is the highest weight.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So let's talk about how we use this method in practice.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: I just mentioned that we often truncate the vector consider only a small number

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: of words that have highest weights in the centroid vector.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: This is for efficiency concern.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: I also say that here that a negative examples or non-relevant examples

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: tend not to be very useful especially compared with positive examples.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Now you can think about the

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: One reason is because negative documents

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: tend to distract the query in all directions so when you take

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: the average it doesn't really tell you where exactly it should be moving to.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _Whereas
column6: positive documents tend to be clustered together and _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: they respond to you to consistent the direction.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So that also means that sometimesw we don't have those negative examples but

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _note that in

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: in some cases in difficult queries where most top random results are negative.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Negative feedback afterwards is very useful.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Another thing is to avoid over-fitting that means we have to

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: keep relatively high weight on the original query terms.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Why?

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Because the sample that we see in feedback is a relatively small sample.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: We don't want to overly trust the small sample and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: the original query terms are still very important.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Those terms are typed in by the user and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: the user has decided that those terms are most important.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: So in order to prevent the us from over-fitting or drifting.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _A type of drift prevent type of drifting due to the bias toward the

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: the feedback examples.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: We generally would have to keep a pretty high weight on the original terms so

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: it is safe to do that.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _And this is especially

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: Now this method can be used for both relevance feedback and

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: pseudo relevance feedback.

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _In the case of pseudo feedback
column6: the parameter beta should be set to a

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: a smaller value because the random examples are assumed

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _to be random there not as reliable as your relevance feedback

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _In the case of relevance feedback
column6: we obviously could use a larger value. _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _So
column6: those parameters still have to be set and. _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _And the ro
column6: Rocchio method is usually robust and effective. _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: _It's
column6: it's still a very popular method for feedback. _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.7 Feedback in Vector Space Model- Rocchio (00-12-05).srt
text: [MUSIC]
